title: How to use a Datasource in Quarkus
content: This article will teach you how to use a plain Datasource resource in a Quarkus application. We will create a simple REST Endpoint and inject a Datasource in it to extract the java.sql.Connection object. We will also learn how to configure the Datasource pool size.
